aliases.name: Program
aliases.comment:
An alias for the Browser.Program that gets produced from this package which makes
it easier to add type annotations for your programs.
aliases.type: Platform.Program flags (Loadable.Model flags model error) (Loadable.Msg model msg error)

values.name: element
values.comment:
Behaves a lot like element from the Html package, with a few additions.

  - `load` replaces `init`.
  - `failCmd` can be used to send any error that results from the `load` task through a port.
  - `loadingView` can take flags and return a loading view.
  - `errorView` can take any error that results from `load` and display an error message.
values.type: { update : innerMsg -> innerModel -> ( innerModel, Platform.Cmd.Cmd innerMsg ), subscriptions : innerModel -> Platform.Sub.Sub innerMsg, view : innerModel -> Html.Html innerMsg, load : flags -> Task.Task e ( innerModel, Platform.Cmd.Cmd innerMsg ), failCmd : Maybe.Maybe (e -> Platform.Cmd.Cmd (Loadable.Msg innerModel innerMsg e)), loadingView : Maybe.Maybe (flags -> Html.Html (Loadable.Msg innerModel innerMsg e)), errorView : Maybe.Maybe (e -> Html.Html (Loadable.Msg innerModel innerMsg e)) } -> Loadable.Program flags innerModel innerMsg e
